```{r}
source ("setup.R")
```

```{r}
data("knz_bison")
```
make age column 
```{r}
bison2 <- knz_bison %>%
  mutate(animal_age = rec_year - animal_yob)
```
function that returns filtered data based on a weight threshold
```{r}
bison_filter_weight <- function (x)
  bison2%>%
  filter (animal_weight >x)
```
apply 
```{r}
bison_filter_weight(500)
```
```{r}
bison2%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=animal_sex, y=animal_weight))+
geom_boxplot()
```
```{r}
bison2 %>% 
  levene_test(animal_weight ~ animal_sex)
```
```{r}
bison2 %>% 
  t_test(animal_weight ~ animal_sex, var.equal = FALSE, detailed = TRUE)
#significantly higher weight for females
```
